data.title: Celine Held & Logan George
data.meta_description: MIDPOINT Institute helps audiovisual professionals at the beginning or turn of their careers improve their projects and craft.
data.text:
Celine Held & Logan George are a co-writer / director duo based in Brooklyn, New York. Logan & Celine’s debut feature film Topside had its world premiere at the 77th Venice Film Festival, International Critics’ Week Competition. Topside won the Mario Serandrei Award for Best Technical Achievement at Venice, and won the Jury Award for Best Director at SXSW 2020. The film was named one of the 20 best films of Venice and Toronto 2020 by the Hollywood Reporter. Their short films have premiered in competition at Cannes Film Festival (Short Film Palme d’Or nominee 2018), Sundance Film Festival, Telluride Film Festival, and in the Narrative and Midnight competitions at SXSW. They were named among Filmmaker Magazine’s 25 New Faces of Independent Film in 2017.

See more at elofilms.com.
